title: The Gatekeepers
description: Even though Rake’s wife Marilyn is about to deliver their first child, Rake agrees to take on a weekend job in Atlanta, where he reunites with a Vietnam war buddy named Mountain. Together they become enmeshed in the political aspirations of America’s most powerful Evangelical: The Reverend Richard Jim Hamilton. The Reverend built the powerhouse Hamilton Ministry, and now has his sights on the US Presidency. Arrayed against him though are his wife, his Chief Lieutenant, and his son Joshua, who in the pursuit of exposing his father, also exposes the Bible’s greatest secret—and turns religious convention on its head.
author: Stephen   Moss
